tetra.improvement.spellstrike_power.name: Spellstrike Power
tetra.improvement.spellstrike_power.desc: Increases Spellstrike power via free Amplify glyphs.
tetra/schematic/shared/spellstrike_power: Augments the Spellstriking Power of the weapon by 1. Each point adds one Amplify to one effect starting form the right-most glyph. A Spell Power II weapon with Touch -> Snare -> Harm -> Ignite inscribed will add an Amplify to Harm and Snare.

tetra.improvement.sword/spellstrike.name: Spellstriking
tetra.improvement.sword/spellstrike.desc: Spellstriking weapons cast an inscribed spell on the target struck.
tetra.improvement.double/spellstrike.des: Spellstriking weapons cast an inscribed spell on the target struck.

tetra/schematic/shared/spellguard_1.name: Spellguarding I
tetra/schematic/shared/spellguard_2.name: Spellguarding II
tetra/schematic/shared/spellguard_3.name: Spellguarding III
tetra/schematic/shared/spellguard_1.desc: Etch careful engravings into your shield, allowing it to have a chance counter blocked hits with a spell once inscribed in a §dScribe's Table§r. Each time this ability, your shield goes on Cooldown.
tetra/schematic/shared/spellguard_2.desc: Etch further intricate patterns into your shield, increasing the chance to counter blocked hits with a spell.
tetra/schematic/shared/spellguard_3.desc: Etch most complex patterns into your shield, further increasing the chance to counter blocked hits with a spell.
tetra/schematic/shared/spellguard_plus.d: Augment the efficiency of your etchings, reducing the Mana costs of the inscribed spell by §625%§r.
tetra/schematic/shared/spellguard_plus_2: Further refine the etchings on your shield, reducing the Mana costs of the inscribed spell by an additional §625%§r
tetra.improvement.spellguard.name: Spellguarding
tetra.improvement.spellguard.description: Spellguarding shields have a chance to cast an inscribed spell on foes after you successfully block.
tetra.improvement.spellguard_plus.name: Spellguarding+
tetra.improvement.spellguard_plus.descri: Mana efficiency of Spellguarding is improved, reducing spell Mana costs.
ars_armiger.spellstrike.invalid: Your spell must not contain a Method!
ars_armiger.spellstrike.cleared: Cleared the spell on the weapon!
ars_armiger.page.tetra_weapons.subtitle: Adding magic to the mundane
ars_armiger.page.tetra_weapons.page1.bod: You surmise you can use materials such as Source Gems, Archwood or Magebloom threads in the construction of modular weapons, imbuing the item with higher Magical Capacity and innate power in the form of Source Leech and Spellstriker. Use a Holosphere to see detailed statistics on these materials.
ars_armiger.page.tetra_weapons.page2.bod: See Example Weapon above$(br)Modular weapons made with magical parts gain the Source Leech ability, which restores the your Mana with each successful strike. The more parts with this ability, the more mana you regain.
ars_armiger.page.tetra_weapons.page3.bod: Modular Weapons can be given a Spell Focus which will allow them to cast an inscribed spell on any struck targets or blocks (if thrown). The weapon can be inscribed at a Scribe's Table by a spell that must NOT contain a form glyph such as Ignite -> Extend Time.
ars_armiger.page.tetra_weapons.page4.bod: Spellstriking has 3 core stats: Power, Usage and Cooldown.$(br)§nPower§r is the number of additional Amplify Glyphs added the spell, added right-to-left. So a spell with 3 Effect Glyphs needs Power 3 to have all its Gylphs amplified.$(br)§nCooldown§r is the time in seconds between uses of Spellstriker.$(br)§nUsage§r is how much of the spell's Mana cost is paid for. All three stats can be improved via Honing!
ars_armiger.page.tetra_weapons.page5.bod: You can choose to add an Elemental Foci rather than Arcane one using Elemental Essences. This attunes your weapon to a given element. An attuned weapon grants all Effect Glyphs of its matching element 1 Amplify Augment but adds 1 Dampen Glyph to all other elemental effects.
ars_armiger.page.tetra_weapons.page6.bod: Modular Shields can also be given the Spellguard improvement which causes them to cast their inscribed spell on the foe who attacks you. This causes the shield to go on Cooldown. Honing can improve activation chance or Mana efficiency.
tetra.variant_category.focus.label: Arcane Material
tetra/schematic/double/shared/focus.name: Spell Focus
tetra/schematic/double/shared/focus.desc: Allows for the weapon to cast spells on struck foes once inscribed at a §dScribe's Table§r. Each use of this ability triggers a Cooldown. Power, Cost and Cooldown can all be improved through honing.
tetra/schematic/single/shared/focus.name: Spell Focus
tetra/schematic/single/shared/focus.desc: Allows for the weapon to cast spells on struck foes once inscribed at a §dScribe's Table§r. Each use of this ability triggers a Cooldown. Power, Cost and Cooldown can all be improved through honing.
tetra/schematic/sword/shared/focus.name: Spell Focus
tetra/schematic/sword/shared/focus.descr: Allows for the weapon to cast spells on struck foes once inscribed at a §dScribe's Table§r. Each use of this ability triggers a Cooldown. Power, Cost and Cooldown can all be improved through honing.
